summary:
The Eurofighter Typhoon is a powerful fighter jet made by a group of European countries. It's fast, can fly very high, and is great for fighting other planes. The Typhoon was first thought of in the 1980s, but it took a long time to build because of some disagreements. It finally started being used by the military in 2003.

Many countries, like the UK, Germany, and Italy, use Typhoons to protect their skies and fight in battles. It can carry different weapons and has been in wars, like the one in Libya. The Typhoon is known for being very good at turning and moving quickly.
title: Eurofighter Typhoon
